item.title: ‘She has two financially stable children’: Does it make sense for my wealthy mother, a recent widow, to take out a $100,000 life-insurance policy?
item.description: “It was generous of our mom to offer.”

item.title: Aluminum Falls After China Reports Production Increase
item.description: Aluminum prices fell below the $2,600-a-metric-ton mark on concerns over weak winter demand and rising output in China.

item.title: Nvidia stock is in a correction. Microsoft’s CEO may have just said something very worrying.
item.description: Satya Nadella, Microsoft’s CEO, and believed to be a big customer of Nvidia was talking about abundant chip supply in a recent interview.

item.title: Sterling Could Rise Further as U.K. Jobs Data Support BOE-ECB Divergence
item.description: Sterling rose after stronger-than-expected U.K. wage data boosted the yield differential against other G-10 currencies, but XTB said the currency face...

item.title: Roth conversions may suddenly seem like a bad idea, but here’s why retirees are still considering them
item.description: There’s more to think about than just current tax rates versus future tax rates.
